original: @470b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @470b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te; bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
analyzed: 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo // de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te; bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
translated: Homage to the Gentle Protector!🔽Then again, youthful Mañjuśrī rose from his seat, draped his upper robe over one shoulder, and knelt on his right knee.

original: bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: bos phyag btsal te /
translated: Bowing to the Blessed One with palms joined, he bowed his head to the Blessed One's feet🔽and said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te; ;bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig pa mthong bar bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te; ;bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig pa mthong bar bgyi ste /
translated: Blessed One, I will reveal the knowledge.

original: rig pa dam pa 'di smras na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig pa dam pa 'di smras na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro //
translated: If I speak this sublime knowledge, it will be wondrous.

original: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /🔽'jam dpal / legs so //
analyzed: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la legs so zhes bya ba byin te / 'jam dpal / legs so //
translated: The entire assembly gave their approval to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mañjuśrī, saying,🔽Excellent, Mañjuśrī!

original: legs so // 'jam dpal /
analyzed: legs so // 'jam dpal /

original: khyod kyis rig pa smros shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis rig pa smros shig /

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis smra bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis smra bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will speak with the words of the Blessed One.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams @471a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams @471a *//
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Mañjuśrī, having bowed to all the buddhas

original: cad kyi snying po chos thams cad la phyag btsal te mchod pa byas nas rig pa smras so //🔽na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: na ma manydzu shr'i ye /
analyzed: cad kyi snying po chos thams cad la phyag btsal te mchod pa byas nas rig pa smras so // na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: na ma manydzu shr'i ye /
translated: and made offerings to all phenomena, spoke this knowledge mantra:🔽Namo all tathāgatas, homage to Mañjuśrī!

translated: Whoever recites it three times at midnight

original: rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro //

original: mi rnams kyis sho lo ka sum brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rnams kyis sho lo ka sum brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: People will remember three hundred ślokas.

original: 'di'i cho ga ni tsandan gyi dkyil 'khor byas te zhun mar gyi mar mes kyang mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di'i cho ga ni tsandan gyi dkyil 'khor byas te zhun mar gyi mar mes kyang mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: The rite for this is to make a maṇḍala of sandalwood, worship with ghee lamps, and recite it eight thousand times. If it is not accomplished,

original: ma grub kyang sho lo ka brgya nyi ma re re la 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma grub kyang sho lo ka brgya nyi ma re re la 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will remember one hundred ślokas every day.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: bdag gis bstan pa 'dis ma grub na gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga byas na bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gis bstan pa 'dis ma grub na gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga byas na bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: if I do not accomplish this teaching, then whoever has committed the five heinous acts, I will also have committed the five heinous acts like them.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dmod btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dmod btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Mañjuśrī's Curse is complete.
